name: Sonic.DDLC
description:
At 1991, Sonic The Hedgehog Was Released, He Goes Fast, Eggman Kidnapped Those Animals And Making Badniks, & Sonic Used All Chaos Emeralds For Good

At 2014, Eggman Making A Plan And Chopping Trees Down, And Sonic Stop Eggman, And Eggman Shoot Sonic With A Gun, And Eggman Start To Been Murder Sonic, Tails Looking At Eggman, And Eggman Start To Eat Until Tails Caught Eggman When He's Starved And Sonic Goes To Heaven,

At 2017, Doki Doki Literature Club, They Has New Mod, Yuri, Natsuki, & Sayori Are Gonna To Start Murder Monika The Red Haired Girl For Reason,

At 2022, The Demon Take Dead Sonic And Dead Monika To The EXE Maker, And Make The Newest Sonic.EXE OC, And He Made, DDLC.Hedgehog.chr
